participant_1.background:

My most valued possession is my health, because without it I cannot do the things that make me happy.
i ve been cheated on by every ex girlfriend except for one.
we have 4 children and 2 dogs.
i m scared of left turns.

content.text: Hey there, how's your day going?
Pretty good, thanks! I'm just relaxing at home, watching some TV.
Nice! I'm doing some work on my blog.
Oh, what kind of blog do you have?
It's about my family and our adventures.
That sounds fun! I'm not very good at writing, but I do like reading.
I'm glad! I love sharing our stories with people.
Yes, we have four dogs and two cats.
Oh wow, that's a lot of animals!
Yeah, it can be a lot of work, but it's also a lot of fun.
I bet! I've always wanted to have a pet, but I'm allergic to cats.
Yeah, it is. But I can still enjoy your blog posts about your pets!
Thanks! I'm glad you like them.
